strategy_reasoning: Translating technical updates (new models, docs merger) into a cozy narrative about a creative studio and community growth keeps the vibe friendly and accessible. Using the 'A/V Club' metaphor makes the new video/audio models feel playful rather than complex.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art, chunky low-res sprites, warm ambient lighting, lime green (#ecf874) accents, pastel gradients, nostalgic retro gaming aesthetic.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute round bee mascot (chubby yellow body, brown stripes, pink blush, small wings) wearing big pixelated headphones, sitting at a retro lo-fi mixing desk. The desk has CRT monitors glowing with soft lime green (#ecf874) waveforms and video frames. Soft lavender and peach gradient background. Chunky sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'A/V STUDIO'. Emotionally warm, nostalgic.
images.description: The bee mascot enjoying the new Audio/Video capabilities (LTX-2, ElevenMusic, Whisper) in a cozy retro studio setting.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby bee mascot planting a digital garden alongside a cute tiny pixel robot. They are working together. Soft pastel mint and lime green (#ecf874) background. Pixel flowers are blooming. Wholesome vibes like A Short Hike or Unpacking. Represents open source collaboration. Warm, inviting, not harsh. Text in pixel font: 'OPEN SOURCE'.
images.description: Visualizing the open source updates (Polly bot, OpenClaw) as the bee gardening with a robot friend.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art close-up of a crafting workbench. The bee mascot is holding a pixelated guidebook that is merging into the table itself. Represents documentation merging with the Play page. Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow from the table. Retro game UI elements (inventory slots). Warm, cozy atmosphere. Text in pixel font: 'LEVEL UP'.
images.description: Metaphor for the Docs merging into the Play page - learning and building happening in the same space.
